Player History
Drafted in 22nd round, 341st overall pick, by Montreal in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/1/2015, off Brian Eppinger (SF)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/10/2015, off Arthur Smith (COL)...
Signed as a free agent by Seattle on 2/15/2016 to a 2-year deal worth $1,500,000 per year...
Injured on 4/8/2017 with a Pulled Achilles Tendon, out for 5 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Cincinnati on 2/25/2018 to a 3-year deal worth $500,000 per year...
Released by Cincinnati on 7/10/2018...
Signed as a free agent by Kansas City on 7/20/2018 to a 1-year deal worth $612,000 per year...
9/11/2018: Signed a contract extension with Kansas City, $500,000 per year, for 2 years.
